data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.

In the minute 3, Toronto to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.

Throw-in Montreal.

Corner awarded to Toronto.

In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the away team in Toronto.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
In the minute 14, Goal! Rudy Camacho heads Montreal into a 0-1 lead.
Romell Quioto instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Montreal.

In the minute 31, Goal kick for Montreal at BMO Field.

Rudy Camacho is booked for the away team.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick Toronto.
